summary: A rich but unscrupulous old woman plots with a scientist to have her brain implanted in the skull of a sexy young woman.
cast: Marjorie Eaton|Frank Gerstle|Frank Fowler|Erika Peters|Judy Bamber|Lisa Lang|Xerxes|Bradford Dillman|Margie Fisco
keywords: mad scientist|brain transplant|eternal youth|grave robbing|mad doctor
director: Directors: Joseph V. Mascelli (as Joseph Mascelli), Jack Pollexfen (uncredited)
title: Monstrosity
